 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁפַר‎</span>] **verb** ==be beautiful, fair, comely== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***remove veil*** (of women), ***shine***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁפַר‎</span> ***be pleasing*** (see [[Dan.6.2|Dan 6:2]]), <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be beautiful, bright, pleasing***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***beautiful***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָֽׁפְרָה עָלָ֑י‎</span> (Aramaic) [[Ps.16.6|Ps 16:6]] (the) heritage ***is beautiful for*** (pleasing to) ***me*** (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> **II. 8**).
